import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Popover } from '@headlessui/react'; import logo from '../../../assets/logopurple2.png'; const TopNav = () => { const [feedbackText, setFeedbackText] = useState(''); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle feedback submission here setFeedbackText(''); }; return (
